他.definition: (third-person singular) (since the early 20th century, usu. male) he; him; his; (bound form) other; another; some other (as in 他日[ta1ri4] and 他人[ta1ren2])

他人.definition: another person; sb else; other people

他信.definition: Thaksin Shinawatra (1949-), Thai businessman and politician, prime minister 2001-2006

他喵的.definition: drat; frick; (euphemistic variant of 他媽的|他妈的[ta1 ma1 de5])

他娘的.definition: same as 他媽的|他妈的[ta1 ma1 de5]

他山之石可以攻玉.pinyin: ta1 shan1 zhi1 shi2 ke3 yi3 gong1 yu4
他山之石可以攻玉.definition: lit. the other mountain's stone can polish jade (idiom); to improve oneself by accepting criticism from outside; to borrow talent from abroad to develop the nation effectively

他律.definition: external regulation (e.g. by means of a regulatory body, as opposed to self-regulation 自律[zi4 lu:4]); (ethics) heteronomy

他日.definition: (literary) some day; (literary) days in the past

他鄉.definition: foreign land; away from one's native place

他鄉遇故知.definition: meeting an old friend in a foreign place (idiom)
